Global	reporting	initiative 
The Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) was set up in late 199
7. Its aim is to develop accepted and comparable 
standards for corporate economic, environmental and social reporting. GRI works with an extensive network of experts in dozens of countries around the world, representing different disciplines and interests. AEGON’s Corporate Responsibility Report 2008 covers m
ost GRI indicators relating to the company’s main areas 
of activity in the CR field. Based on existing guidelines and the GRI’s G3 standards, AEGON assesses the Application Level of this 2008 Report as ‘B’, unchanged from 2007. Please see page 47 for a detailed assessment of AEGON’s performance under the GRI index.
